nodes.text: Following the Battle of Endor, Mon Mothma issued a declaration that formally established the New Republic and completed the Rebel Alliance's transformation into a political power.

The declaration of a New Republic was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: On the Front Lines by Daniel Wallace. Before that, it first appeared in Star Wars Legends in the Heir to the Empire Sourcebook, a 1992 reference book written by Bill Slavicsek.
